top_questions.text: Write the use of statement “INPUT #1, N$, A$, S” in the above program.​

Write a program in C language to input a number and then check whether the number is positive, negative or zero number. (4) OR Write a program in C language to display the series with their sum 1, 2, 3, 4, … up to 10th terms. (4) OR Write a program in C language to display the series with their sum 1, 2, 3, 4, ... up to 10th terms. (4)
Write a program to create a sequential data file named “Employee.dat” to store Name, Post, Address and Salary for the number of employees. The program should terminate on user’s choice. (4)
